metaTags.metaDescription: The Free Plan provides free SSL, CDN, DDoS protection and more. Cloudflare's Free plan gives you all the basics you need to protect & accelerate your website.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: The basics you need to protect and accelerate your site
relatedBlades.copy: Our mission is to build a better Internet. We believe every website should have free access to foundational security and performance.

relatedBlades.title: Get your site or network up and running with our Free plan features

features.title: Unmatched DDoS mitigation
features.description: Protect your site with the world's #1 ranked DDoS mitigation solution. Rest easy knowing Cloudflare's got your back.

features.title: The world's fastest DNS resolver
features.description:
Leverage the most private and the world's fastest DNS resolver: 1.1.1.1
We will never sell your data or use it to target you with ads. Period.

icon.description: Orange icon of boxes trading places

features.title: The world's #1 ranked Content Delivery Network (CDN)
features.description:
Accelerate your website with our %{DataCenterCount} data centers worldwide. 
We route your traffic to our closest data center ensuring lightning-fast load times.

features.title: Free SSL certificate
features.description: Secure the transfer of data between you and your website visitors instantly, with a free shared SSL certificate from Cloudflare.

features.title: Free Network Security
features.description: Secure, connect, and accelerate your network with our free Zero Trust and network security products

content.value: Popular use cases to protect and accelerate your:

slides.title: Blog
slides.copy: Eliminate slow load time for your readers using Cloudflare's massive content delivery network.

slides.title: WordPress Site
slides.copy: Leverage Cloudflare's edge network of %{DataCenterCount} data centers for decreased load times and next-level web security, with features built specifically for WordPress.

image.description: Illustration of a fast-loading WordPress site

imageAssetFile.altText: Free Plan Use cases WordPress Site

contentfulAsset.description: Free Plan Use cases - WordPress Site

slides.title: Minecraft Server
slides.copy: Prevent your Minecraft server from being DDoSed with Cloudflare's Advanced DDoS Mitigation. In 2021 Cloudflare mitigated the largest DDoS attack in history coming in at 17.2 million requests per second.

image.description: Illustration of Cloudflare protecting a Minecraft server from an attack

slides.title: E-commerce Store
slides.copy: Speed up and protect your e-commerce site with Cloudflare's vast network of data centers. Cloudflare's network is within 50 ms from 95% of the world's Internet-connected population. Your site's content is routed to the closest data center to your customer resulting in extremely fast load times. Shopify uses Cloudflare to protect and secure its eCommerce SaaS!

slides.title: Web Applications
slides.copy: Protect & speed up your web applications absolutely free. Kick off your next project without worrying about DDoS attacks and data breaches!

slides.title: JAMStack Site
slides.copy: Kick off your JAMStack site the right way. By leveraging the benefits of Cloudflare, you'll have all the basics you need to get started.

relatedBlades.title: Why is our free plan so good?
relatedBlades.copy:
At Cloudflare, our mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe the web should be open and free, and that ALL websites and web users, no matter how small, should be safe, secure, and fast. Cloudflare always has and always will offer a generous free plan for [many reasons](https://webmasters.stackexchange.com/questions/88659/how-can-cloudflare-offer-a-free-cdn-with-unlimited-bandwidth). 

We work hard to minimize the cost of running our network so we can offer huge value in our Free plan. On top of this, protecting more sites means we get better data about the types of attacks on our network so we can offer better security and protection for all. 

As a privacy-first company, one thing we DON'T do is sell your data. In fact, Cloudflare recognizes privacy in personal data as a fundamental human right and has taken a [number of steps](https://blog.cloudflare.com/certifying-our-commitment-to-your-right-to-information-privacy/) to demonstrate our commitment to privacy.

relatedBlades.quote: "Knowing that we don't have to worry about DDoS attacks against our API and gateway servers gives us the peace of mind to focus on improving our product."

relatedBlades.title: Add-ons to take your site to the next level

content.value: Load Balancing safeguards from service disruptions with local and global traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.
Rate Limiting protects against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force password attempts, and other types of abusive behavior targeting the application layer.
Argo is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely. Argo includes: Smart Routing and Tiered Caching.
Cloudflare Workers lets developers deploy serverless code written in JavaScript, Rust, C, and C++ to Cloudflare's edge, closer to the end user.
Cloudflare One helps customers connect, protect, and accelerate their network traffic
Cloudflare Stream makes streaming high quality video at scale, easy and affordable.
Advanced Certificate Manager is a flexible and customizable way to issue and manage certificates in Cloudflare.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
